interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Yoga for the Rest of Us: Easy Yoga for Arthritis
Review Date: 2019/11/12
Store: .  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness
Product Description: ["Join yoga teacher Peggy Cappy as she demonstrates movements to use at home to strengthen muscles and help increase mobility for people who are challenged by arthritis or the stiffness that comes with age or injury. This new special is divided into seven easy-to-use segments that will leave you energized and feeling more flexible: • Gentle Warm-ups to loosen shoulders, neck and back, legs and feet• Warm-ups for the hands, wrists, and arms• Standing poses• Seated poses• Reclining poses• Deep relaxation techniques• MeditationThis gentle yoga routine is perfect for people of all ages and abilities as Peggy's unique approach allows for three modifications for each pose: standing, seated or using a chair for support. Plus, Peggy incorporates meditation into this workout, a technique proven to increase our ability to deal with stress."]
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 35 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Item model number': 'YOAR601', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 35 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 9, 2010', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'PBS', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Great workout.
Review Title: Too long..have alot to do in the morning..don't need to spent more than hour on yoga.
Rating: 4.0

Doris Day: The Essential Collection
Rock Hudson  (Actor),     Doris Day  (Actor),     Norman Jewison  (Director),     Michael Gordon  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Classics
['Charismatic and beautiful, Doris Day is America\'s original sweetheart who delighted audiences with her comedic timing, silky-smooth voice and sunny personality during the 1950s and 1960s. A box-office sensation for many years, her hugely successful acting career is celebrated in Doris Day: The Essential Collection which includes a selection of her most popular screen appearances: Pillow Talk, Lover Come Back, Send Me No Flowers, The Thrill Of It All!, Midnight Lace and The Man Who Knew Too Much. Co-starring Hollywood legends including Rock Hudson, James Stewart, Tony Randall, Rex Harrison and James Garner, this timeless collection is a stunning tribute to the "girl next door" who continues to capture hearts on and off the screen.Bonus Content:', 'Disc 1 - Pillow Talk:', 'Back in Bed with Pillow Talk', 'Back in Bed with Pillow Talk', 'Chemistry 101: The Film Duo of Doris Day and Rock Hudson', 'Chemistry 101: The Film Duo of Doris Day and Rock Hudson', 'Feature Commentary with Film Historians Jeff Bond, Julie Kirgo and Nick Redman', 'Feature Commentary with Film Historians Jeff Bond, Julie Kirgo and Nick Redman', 'Trailer', 'Trailer', 'Disc 4 - The Man Who Knew Too Much:', 'The Making of The Man Who Knew Too Much', 'The Making of The Man Who Knew Too Much', 'Production Photographs', 'Production Photographs', 'Trailers', 'Trailers', 'Production Notes.', 'Production Notes.']

The Six Million Dollar Man: Season 1
Lee Majors  (Actor),     Richard Anderson  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Action & Adventure
['Grievously injured in the crash of an experimental aircraft, Colonel Steve Austin\'s shattered body is covertly rebuilt via the miracle of modern science known as bionics. Equipped with atomic-powered limbs that make him "better, stronger, faster" than the average mortal, Austin (Lee Majors) can now run at speeds exceeding 60 miles per hour, overturn cars with ease, and spot an encroaching enemy from over a mile away. Under the watchful eye of OSI director Oscar Goldman (Richard Anderson), Steve repays his debt to the taxpayers by taking on perilous missions of a highly classified nature. Season 1 chronicles Steve Austin\'s amazing metamorphosis from "a man barely alive" to cyborg to patriotic superspy. Armed with futuristic abilities, Austin is dispatched to do battle with kidnappers, arms smugglers, evil scientists, political assassins, and a diabolical robot—with time enough to spare to counsel a troubled astronaut (William Shatner) and clear his dead father\'s name. Relive the thrill of Steve\'s first bionic run in this digitally remastered 6-DVD set featuring 13 uncut episodes; all three made-for-TV movies in their original, unedited versions; and over two hours of never-before-seen bonus materials!', 'Bonus Content:', 'Disc 6:', 'Real Bionics', 'Real Bionics', 'An Iconic Opening', 'An Iconic Opening', 'Season 1 VIPs: A celebration of The Six Million Dollar Man Guest Stars', 'Season 1 VIPs: A celebration of The Six Million Dollar Man Guest Stars', 'OSI Mission Debriefing: Executive Producer Harve Bennett', 'OSI Mission Debriefing: Executive Producer Harve Bennett', 'Interactive Bonus Feature: Bionic Breakdown', 'Interactive Bonus Feature: Bionic Breakdown', ']]>']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to enjoy LGBT-themed adult movies while expanding their media repertoire, now incorporating exercise and fitness content, alongside classic and action-themed television series, showing a diverse range of interests.
- **Media Format:** The user prefers DVDs for adult content and boxed sets of classic series, now also engaging with fitness DVDs, indicating an openness to various genres in traditional formats.
- **Quality Expectations:** With a high standard for video quality, the user critically assesses all content types. Their rating for the new exercise video reflects an appreciation for instructional media that is both effective and well-produced.
- **Rating Behavior:** Historically critical of low-quality adult content (rating as low as 1.0), the user has shown a more positive response to fitness content and classic series, recently giving a 4.0 rating, suggesting a developing appreciation for quality across genres.
- **Engagement with Content:** The user actively engages with explicit media while also exploring fitness routines and classic action/adventure series, reflecting a nuanced approach to entertainment that values quality production regardless of genre.

Overall, the user demonstrates a multifaceted interest in adult media, classic television, and fitness content, maintaining a strong focus on high standards of video quality and a willingness to explore new genres.
